string-array.name: breakfast_array
string-array.item: Bacon and Eggs - Non-traditional but delicous!

string-array.name: lunch_array
string-array.item: PB and J - You know, for the kids!
Bierock - Yeast dough dumpling filled with shredded beef, cabbage, and onions
Gnocci - potato dumplings filled with squash

string-array.name: dinner_array
string-array.item: Verenika - cheese curd filled potato dumpling
Roast Beef steamed bun - like a good cheesesteak, only steamed!
Pierogis - choose spinach, mushroom, or mashed potatoes

string-array.name: dessert_array
string-array.item: Chocolate Rangoon - melted chocolate inside a fried wonton
Bohne Beroggi - like a dessert pierogi, stuffed with sweet beans
Red Bean Dumplings - sweet red bean in rice dough
